meanings.definition: The act of consecrating or the state of being consecrated.
meanings.sent1: The consecrations of the temple were performed with great reverence.
meanings.sent2: The consecrations of the new church brought the community together.
meanings.sent3: During the consecrations, the priest accidentally tripped over his robe.
meanings.sent4: The consecrations of the ancient ruins echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The consecrations of the sacred ground filled the air with a sense of holiness.

meanings.definition: The dedication of a person or thing to the service and worship of a deity.
meanings.sent1: The consecrations of the offering were a solemn ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The consecrations of the bells marked the beginning of the festival.
meanings.sent3: The consecrations of the cat to the sun god raised a few eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: The consecrations of the ship to Poseidon ensured safe voyages.
meanings.sent5: The consecrations of the garden to the nature spirits brought abundant harvests.
